I

IBookController - Interface in controller
This interface is used to allow for the application layer to call methods within the controller layer without directly accessing the controller layer.
icon - Variable in class presentation.MessageDialog
The image to display in the dialog.
INFORMATIVE - Enum constant in enum class presentation.MessageType
Message provides helpful information to the user.
initialize() - Method in class controller.LibraryController
Initializes the application layer and the user interface components.
insertBooks(List<Book>) - Method in class database.DatabaseManager
Inserts a list of books into the database.
invokeDeleteConfirmation(String, Book) - Method in interface controller.IBookController
Used to get confirmation from the user before deleting the provided book.
invokeDeleteConfirmation(String, Book) - Method in class controller.LibraryController
Asks the user for confirmation before deleting a book from the database.
invokeError(String) - Method in interface controller.IBookController
Used to display an error message.
invokeError(String) - Method in class controller.LibraryController
Displays an error message to the user.

Used to display a message.
invokeMessage(String) - Method in class controller.LibraryController
Displays a message to the user.
invokePreview(ArrayList<Book>) - Method in interface controller.IBookController
Used to display new books provided by the user before adding them to the library database.
invokePreview(ArrayList<Book>) - Method in class controller.LibraryController
Displays new books provided by the user and asks the user for confirmation before adding them to the library database.
